Text: Last year it assigned its new Chevrolet Blazer, a sport utility vehicle that had been made in the US, to a Mexican plant, while announcing it would lay off 18,000 American workers.
Cause: Last year it assigned its new Chevrolet Blazer, a sport utility vehicle that had been made in the US, to a Mexican plant
Effect: it would lay off 18,000 American workers.
Sentence: <e1>Last year it assigned its new Chevrolet Blazer, a sport utility vehicle that had been made in the US, to a Mexican plant</e1>, while announcing <e2>it would lay off 18,000 American workers.</e2>
